ModMetaData.name: Yayo's EndGame (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Latki, YAYO
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Latki, YAYOs mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2260853046
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/YayosEndGame][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/6KqTKks.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1][b]* Add a new ending[/b][/h1]
[h1][b]* About[/b][/h1] I was always dissatisfied with experiencing only one biome at Rimworld. But it wasn't fun to travel the biomes for no reason. This mod gives you a reason to travel to many biomes.
This story is a long epic. We will settle for several years in each of the 3 biomes in rimworld, extract biome energy, and leave for a planet called by the unknown who created this teleporter.
[list][img]https://imgur.com/Q1Ziva2.gif[/img][/list]
[h1]1. Extract 100 biome energy shards from each of 3 biomes.[/h1] - Extracts energy shards from the biome. Depending on the working biome, the types of biome energy shards generated differ. - So you have to travel through 3 biomes. (number can be modified in options.)
[list][img]https://imgur.com/Yl2FaDg.gif[/img][/list] [list][img]https://imgur.com/UlUJ0di.png[/img][/list]
[h1]2. Make a planet energy core.[/h1] - A key material for building planet energy teleporters. To make this, you need biome energy shard. - 3 types of biome shard required is randomly determined.
[list][img]https://imgur.com/9xgmynT.png[/img][/list]
[h1]3. Build a planet energy teleporter.[/h1] - Lights from planetary energy shard explain this device. We figured out how to make this device and that it is a device for moving to another planet, but we haven't figured out where this is pointing us. Those who made this seem to want us to come to them.
[list][img]https://imgur.com/kMZ9DeK.gif[/img][/list]
[h1]4. 15-day raid defense.[/h1]
[h1]5. Escape.[/h1] - There is a new ending text.
[h1][b]* Compatibility[/b][/h1] - Compatible with biome add-on mods. - Saved game compatible
[h1][b]* Incompatible !!![/b][/h1] - SOS2-save our ship 2
[h1][b]* Creadit[/b][/h1] - Latki (Art) - Yayo (Dev)
[b]Please take this mod and modify it. The source code is included. I'd love to see variations come out with various ideas. I'm a game designer, and I haven't implemented many ideas yet due to lack of time. If you are proficient in C# and are interested, please contact me on the rimworld discord.[/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
